dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for machine translation consisting of about 4.56M sentence pairs from English to German.

dcterms:description: A set of probing tasks designed for targeted linguistic evaluation to assess linguistic properties captured by sentence embeddings.

dcterms:description: A dataset for logical inference tasks that evaluates the ability of models to learn hierarchical and nested structures of language.
